development/environment-setup.title: Environment Setup

index.title: Welcome to Codomyrmex Documentation
index.description: Codomyrmex is a modular, extensible coding workspace designed to integrate open-source tools for building, documenting, analyzing, executing, and visualizing code.

intro.title: Welcome to Codomyrmex Documentation
intro.description: This is the central documentation hub for the Codomyrmex project.

modules/documentation/mcp_tool_specifica.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Documentation module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). These tools primarily interact with the Docusaurus documentation website generation process.

modules/documentation/usage_examples.description: This section provides usage examples related to the documentation module itself, such as managing the documentation build, local development, or specific Docusaurus features relevant to Codomyrmex.

modules/logging_monitoring/mcp_tool_spec.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Logging & Monitoring module that could be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Currently, the core functionality of this module (setuplogging, getlogger) is designed for direct Python integration within the Codomyrmex application and is not exposed as discrete MCP tools.

modules/pattern_matching/docs/tutorials/.title: Getting Started with Pattern Matching
modules/pattern_matching/docs/tutorials/.description: This tutorial will guide you through using the Pattern Matching module's runcodomyrmexanalysis.py script to analyze a codebase.

modules/pattern_matching/docs/tutorials/.title: Pattern Matching - Tutorials
modules/pattern_matching/docs/tutorials/.description: Welcome to the Pattern Matching tutorials. These step-by-step guides will help you learn how to use the various features of the Pattern Matching module.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: All notable changes to the Pattern Matching module will be documented in this file.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching Module
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: The Pattern Matching module enables exhaustive, type-safe pattern matching across the Codomyrmex ecosystem. It provides tools for code analysis, dependency tracking, and semantic pattern recognition.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching - MCP Tool Specification
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Pattern Matching module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). These tools leverage the cased/kit toolkit for various code analysis and search functionalities.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching - Documentation Tasks
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: This document tracks the remaining documentation tasks for the Pattern Matching module. It is for internal use and should be removed once all tasks are complete.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching - Usage Examples
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: This document provides practical examples of using the Pattern Matching module.
